attributes.action: Protect Gibraltar Territorial waters and  Rights of Gibraltarians and Visitors to Freedom of Movement
attributes.additional_details:
Must press the UK government to act on behalf of Her Majesty the Queen and protect the right of Fellow British Citizens to there freedom of naviagtion in British Terriotrial Waters.

HMG must act immmediately as there will be serious escalations which will do not just fall on the 30,000 British citizens but there visitors and neighbours who live out of this territory.

We are in the 21st Century and part of a modern Europe behavior by another member state as seen over past 12 months should no longer be tolerated and the Highest Memeber of HMG must meet the same counterpart of the opposing state to ensure the rights of all citizens is safeguarded with any consequences.

Mediation is required immediately and the measures previously inplace to reoslve this between all three parties muct be reconstituted without further draconian attitudes by others.
